devDependencies: @babe/preset-env === A Babel preset for each environment.
@babe/preset-react === A Babel preset for all React plugins.
cross-env === Run scripts that set and use environment variables across platforms.
eslint === An AST-based pattern checker for JavaScript.
eslint-config-prettier === Turns off all rules that are unnecessary or might conflict with Prettier.
eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y === A static AST checker for accessibility rules on JSX elements.
eslint-plugin-react === React specific linting rules for ESlint.
eslint-plugin-react-hooks === ESlint rules for React Hooks.
parcel-bundler === Blazing fast, zero confiduration web application bundler.
dependencies: react === JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
react-dom === React package for working with the DOM.
